alert.note: Alert for Butler; Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 2:55PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Butler and western Greenwood Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 254 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Leon, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rosalia, El Dorado State Park and El Dorado Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
